Tanto los platos sugeridos como la seleccion del menu, es fantastica.Sin embargo siempre hay un detalle que consigue que mi experiencia ese dia no sea redonda.En ocasiones son detalle pequeñitos relacionados con el servicio, pero siempre hay algo es que recurrente..... las papas a la francesa..... como las pueden poner CONGELADAS?? en serio?? Si hay algo que para mi demuestra el cariño en una cocina es justamente la forma en la que hacen las papas a la francesaPor favor cambienlo urgentemente!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: He sido un cliente recurrente en Furca desde hace tiempo. sin lugar a duda es EL MEJOR steakhouse de Costa Rica. Los cortes son siempre madurados a la perfección y sus preparaciones sublimes! Resalto la atención del Marco Leiva y del gerente Sergio, siempre amables y atentos a cualquier consulta. Definitivamente regresaré.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Ayer fuimos por primera vez a este lugar , despues de escuchar muchos comentarios excelentes del mismo la carne que pedimos chateaubriand y sirloin estaba muy buenas , quedan para mi entre los top 5 de restaurantes de carnes de CR aunque no de numero 1 , la atencion fue buena pero le falto , no nos llenaron los vasos de agua con la frecuencia requerida , y escuche a los meseros medio burlarse de un cliente !.Los precios no son baratos pero dejando de lado las entradas y demas el plato fuerte el precio esta bien

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Este restaurante ha logrado posicionarse dentro de la oferta nacional como un lugar que reúne agradables condiciones para que la experiencia de visita sea recordada La atmosfera es acogedora y la atención se caracteriza por un servicio destacable, con personal pendiente ante cualquier necesidad del comensalLa comida es digna de tal esfuerzo, con atención a detalles que se bien logran en una comunión de buen sabor. Se recomienda entre los cortes el entrecote y la falta, los cuales resultan especialmente sabrosos. Existe variedad de guarniciones, y una oferta de vino adecuada

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: La comida es deliciosa. La calidad supera todos los restaurantes de la zona. El servicio es de excelente calidad. Los pancitos de cortesía son deliciosos. Mis favoritos son el Sirloin y el creme brulee

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El mejor Restaurante en carnes y muy bueno en los vinos, la atencion muy buena,se los recomiendo estan solos

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Al Furca lo envuelve una atmósfera acogedora y un excepcional encabezado por su Chef Marco. A pesar de especializarse en carnes, lo que pidas es excelente. La carta de vinos es amplia y muy buena. Entre otros, recomiendo el entrecote, el costillar en cocción lenta de 12hrs, y el pulpo a las brasas.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: En un ambiente sobrio y muy agradable, la mejor comida y la atención insuperable, además de una excelente ubicación

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente lugar para una noche especial, platos muy bien logrados con acompanamientos diversos que te permiten combinaciones realmente exquicitas. Talvez el defecto es una carta de vinos limitada.Muy buena atencion.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Ambiente moderno y agradable, servicio excepcional y comida exquisita. Fui para una reunión de negocios con 5 personas más y todos salimos muy satisfechos con el sabor, las porciones y el servicio.El concepto es que armas tu propio plato con la carne o pescado, la salsa de tu elección y acompañantes.Hay muy buenas fotos en la página de Facebook de este restaurante.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Con apenas unos anitos de inaugurado, tiene una especialida de carne, pero tambien contempla otros platos riquisimos, con una gran variedad de vinos. Me encanto los noques de calaba()a y la Picana. Excelentes postres y digestivos

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: he vuelto al Furca y sigo pensando que es un excelente asador de carnes de muy buena calidad. carne marmoleada y madurada con 21-28 dias. MUY BUENA.el resto de la carta es una cocina basica y moderna. .pero a mi particularmente,si dejo la carne aparte, no hay ningun otro plato que me llame la atencion.por eso califico el restaurante como ASADOR de CARNES .el servicio SUPERBUENOel local muy elegante, bello, con mucha luz,bien decorado, de lo mejor en San Jose.el precio es un poco alto pero se justifica por el servicio y la calidad del local.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Quedé sorprendido con la calidad del restaurante: Super Moderno,   muy muy buena atención y excelente comida. Ahí mismo en el restaurante maduran la carne y te permiten conocer el proceso. Recomiendo este restaurante a los viajeros de San Jose.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Buena comida en un gran ambiente, excelente atenciónaltamente recomendable.Sera visita obligada cuando visite la ciudad

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Ya son varias las veces que como aquí. Negocios, placer, cualquier ocasión.  La calidad de la comida es muy muy buena. El servicio del personal sobresaliente. Los precios, no es económico, pero lo vale. Promedio de $40 por persona.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Restaurante con muy buen ambiente... Atención de primera y comida deliciosa... Volvería siempre que pueda... La sangría es mortal, súper recomendado...

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: De los mejores lugares para comer carnes!!Las entradas son deliciosas, tienen muy buena atención, el lugar súper bonito y mucha variedad de cortes.De mis favoritos

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Lo cierto es que la cena fue muy rica, en especial la carne, por poner una pega quizás los postres un poco flojos en comparación con el resto de la carta. Nos atendió César, muy agradable y preocupado por recomendarnos y atendernos lo mejor posible. La pena para poder repetir más veces es el precio! En cualquier caso, se paga pero se come muy rico!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El restaurante y muy agradable al igual cuenta con una muy buena ubicación; la comida de alta calidad / sabor, un lugar que merece visitar.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Acompañando a un amigo a almorzar, disfrutamos de una sabrosa comida, un ambiente bien iluminado pero unas sillas débiles y de cuidado, al punto que las patas de mi silla se abrieron y por poco voy al suelo. Ni se inmutaron, como si fuera normal y de todos los días. En un lugar de calidad, se disculpan y al menos dan una cortesía. Aquí no. La cuenta completa, costosa y con susto incluido.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Todo excelente!!!!!! 100% recomendado, ambiente muy ameno para degustar sus exquisitos platillos.Sin más que pedir...

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Varios conocidos y amigos nos habian recomendado comer en Furca. Es normal que uno se vaya formando altas expectativas del lugar antes de llegar en cuanto al ambiente, servicio y la gastronomia. Pues bien, al llegar con mi familia un domingo avanzada la tarde (4pm) percibí un cansancio en el personal logico de un probable ajetreado día. Eso significo una atencion regular. En mi caso, ordene un lomito y de lomito solo tenia el nombre pues me parecio lomo u otro corte pues no estaba suave ni sabia a lomito, me lleve la impresión de que ya no tenían el corte de carne que había solicitado. Les recomiendo mejor tener un horario fijo de atención y tener mayor inventario en la cocina.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente lugar, atmósfera especial para orejas o familia y también para un almuerzo de negocios la carne es excelente me atrevo a decir que de las mejores del país y el menú muy bueno un poco caro especialmente los acompañantes pero cala la pena

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Increíble la comida, mucha variedad de platos, todo lo que he probado ha estado riquísimo. El servicio es excelente y muy buen ambiente

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Un buen ambiente, con un servicio excelente, muy buen la atención, y más aun la calidad de los platillos.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El ambiente es súper acogedor, buen parqueo, comida espectacular, atención impecable. Agradable para ir en pareja o en familia.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: He ido con gente de trabajo, con mi esposa, con amigos y hasta después de un partido en el Estadio Nacional, excelente atención, la comida es espectacular, sobre todo la hamburguesa y la entraña, el salmón y los camarones de entrada.Tienen gran variedad de cervezas nacionales e importadas, y las sirven heladas como debe ser.Super recomendado, de lo mejor en CR.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: La atención y el ambiente son excelentes. Tienen su propia huerta y preparación de carnes. Puedes ver a los chef preparando tu platillo y la presentación de éstos es excelente.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: En cuanto a presentación, sabor y calidad del menú, excelentes, hicieron mi plato a mi gusto, me gusta por ser privado

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: La carne la preparan muy bien, los tamaños son buenos, los cortes grandes se pueden compartir.  El servicio es excelente.  El diseño y decoración son muy agradables y trendy.  Excelente lugar para disfrutar.  El precio sí es alto!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es realmente grato encontrar un lugar en el que el menú esta hecho con lógica y corazón, al abrir el menú me sentí como "un zorro dentro de un gallinero" había varias opciones que quería elegir pero no me decidía por ninguna, las quería todas. Vamos a tener que volver a probar unos platos que nos quedamos con las ganas de pedir.En ambiente y concepto del Restaurante nos encanto.El servicio muy bueno y atento, la comida muy buena la presentación y sabor. Uno de los mejores Restaurantes en San Jose sin duda.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy buena experiencia la cena que tuvimos en este restaurante. Fuimos atendidos por un chef propietario que nos explico de manera excelente sobre los procesos de maduración de la carne.  La carne que comimos estaba muy bien preparada.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Los acompañamientos del plato principal te los cobran a partir de 3000 colones cada uno. Te cobran por respirar, te cobran mucho y te dan poco. La vajilla muy incomoda y no está a la altura del establecimiento. Las mesas para cuatro ya para dos, resultan incomodas, no caben los platos. Poco espacio. La pasta estaba dura, la carne para no repetir el tiramisu extraño y un largo etc. Los meseros correctos, el capitán que ellos llaman para decir lo que no está bien te da disculpas de mal pagador. En resumen caro y malo. No volveré.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fui con un grupo de amigos, la verdad el servicio increible la comida sin palabras, la verdad de los mejores restaurantes en Costa Rica en mi opinion

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fuimos a Furca en enero 2015. Deliciosa comida, la atención impecable y perfecta creo que nunca me había sentido tan acogedora en un restaurante, la decoración, música en vivo con piano, y los meseros impresionantes, nunca me faltó agua ni vino en mi copa, a pesar que el restaurante estaba full clientes.Ahhh!!El postre estaba increíble!!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente decoración y buen servicio, un lugar diferente en San José, desde mi punto de vista el precio es alto en comparación con la satisfacción de los platos.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: es un restaurante muy cosmopolitas, exquisita decoración, impecable servicio y un menú bien preparado, una carta de vinos extensa, siempre a la mejor temperatura.Las entradas y los cortes de carnes son inmejorables, rápido servicio y alta calidad, mi preferido

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: No te imaginas que perdido en al capital y poco conocido por los locales te encuentres con un lugar así que vale la pena disfrutar,muna excelente atención el lugar bien puesto sin exageraciones pero sin faltantes con una buena muestra de buen gusto , la maduración y añejamiento de las carnes frente a ti a través de un cristal que te abre el apetito , al fondo un jardín dee hierbas aromáticas que hace un perfecto balance con el interior, buena pero pequeña cava , y además mariscos bien seleccionados y preparados .

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Cenamos en este Restaurante la noche del 13 febrero 2015. Fue la primera vez y me sorprendió positivamente el lugar desde mi ingreso. La calidad de la comida me gusto mucho donde si aun el precio no es económico yo creo importante remarcar que la calidad tiene siempre un costo y por ende esta bien calculado en función de lo que estos maestros de la carne logran ofrecerte. Servicio impecable y muy atento. A raíz de muchos pedidos en la cocina me gusto mucho la iniciativa del salonero donde de su propia iniciativa nos sirvió un pate como cortesía de la casa junto a una variedad de panes. Estas iniciativas y detalles me encantan. La verdad poder encontrar un Restaurante como esto en Costa Rica es un privilegio ya que el mismo no tiene nada que envidiar a Restaurantes de alto nivel ubicados en Europa. Un único consejo mejorar un poco mas la calidad de algunos postres-dulce....para mi es importante poder terminar una cena con algo sorprendente...un buen dulce acompañado de un vino dulce tipo "moscato o un vin Santo de Pantelleria". Los felicito.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Me sorprende mucho no ver a Furca como uno de los mejores restaurantes del país... Aunque no me gusta caer en comparaciones, los que opinan que La Esquina de Buenos Aires (uno de mis favoritos) vende la mejor carne, definitivente no han ido a Furca... ambiente agradable... atención excelente y bueno la calidad sin palabras... #1en carnes a mi gusto en Costa Rica

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fuí a Furca con mi esposo, el 5 de febrero, 2015 a cenar. Anteriormente lo conocíamos pero nos habían contado que el menú había variado para mejor. Efectivamente así fue, en nuestra opinión. De entrada nos recibieron con cava española (un tipo de vino espumante) y una orden de pan hecho en casa, muy rico. Luego pedimos una entrada camarones tempura de entrada (muy rico, pero con solo 5 camarones) y una carne entrecot. Ambas sabían deliciosas! Todo exquisito.El precio, es alto. El menú viene con todas las opciones separadas, por ejemplo: el corte un precio, la salsa que desee, otro precio, los acompañamientos otro precio. así que conforme usted va ordenando considere que cada detalle suma. Comer en Furca es como una pulsera de Pandora, cada pìeza viene por separado depende de su billetera y su gusto para armar su plato soñado.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Buena atención, pero a mi criterio no vale lo que cobran he comido carne igual a mitad del precio, el Chile como acompañamiento no es la mejor opción, poco sabor y las cebollas pasadas de fuego demasiado suaves para mi gusto

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy buena atención, los cortes de carne llegaron justo en los términos solicitados y la música en vivo hizo la velada aún más acogedora. Recomendado altamente.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Pocas veces se encuentra un restaurante que combine una excelente cocina con tan especial trato. El calor humano fusionado con inmejorables sabores hace de la visita algo mágico

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fantastica experiencia para una familia que disfruta la buena carne.Sin duda uno de los mejores lugares en San Jose en el cual pasar una velada satisfactoria.El nivel de servicio y atencion posiblemente sea de los 3 mejores de la ciudad.Excelente lista de vinos, carnes al punto, tiempo de servicio.Muchos detalles que se aprecian cuando la cuenta es alta pero uno siente que lo vale!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es uno de los mejores restaurantes en San Jose, buena ubicacion y con un menu variado.La presentacion de las carnes empacadas individuales al vacio en el escaparate, hace que todo se antoje.Mi preferida entrada de antipastos y picanha, excelente servicio y carta de vinos

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: visito con frecuencia este restaurante, por la calidez de  su ambiente, su excelente servicio, variado menú e inmejorable comida,

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El Chateaubriand fue exquisito y la entrada de camarones tempura fue sensacional. Tiene su propio jardín de las especies que es utilizan en la elaboración de sus platos lo cual es un plusEl local y la atención son excelentes

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: He ido a Furca varias veces desde que abrieron sus puertas y siempre había gozado de su ambiente tranquilo y su buena comida. Sin embargo, el sábado pasado en la noche fuimos a cenar 5 personas y nos llevamos una gran decepción. Aunque la comida fue de buena calidad, en lugar del jazz que solían poner como música de fondo ahora ponen música escandalosa típica de un bar en el que la gente tiene que gritar para poder conversar. Pedimos a dos meseros que bajaran el volumen pero eso no dió resultado. Al final, el jefe de meseros vino a disculparse cuando ya estábamos pagando la cuenta. Cierto que nos ofreció unos "limoncellos" a cuenta de la casa, que por cierto no aceptamos pues lo único que queríamos era salir corriendo del lugar. ¿Es un bar o un restaurante? Lamento que un restaurante de este nivel haya dado un traspié así pues no harán más que perder clientes, como en el caso nuestro.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Al llegar a Furca, lo primero que uno encuentra es un establecimiento con un muy llamativo diseño arquitectónico. Cuenta con suficiente espacio para estacionar. La decoración y mobiliario invitan a darle una oportunidad. Para las damas, puede haber un primer inconveniente: las sillas no tienen un respaldar que permita colgar os bolsos, por lo que si no hay disponibles suficientes percheros, puede ser que tengan que permanecer toda la velada con las carteras en los regazos (una opción menos decorosa es dejar la cartera en el piso).El menú es interesante y diverso, por lo que siempre se puede encontrar algo que llame la atención. Sobre los platos principales debo decir que evidentemente el fuerte son las carnes rojas. Estas son de muy buena calidad; sin embargo uno puede cuestionarse si la relación precio calidad es la adecuada. El pan de la casa está muy bien elaborado y los acompañamientos son acordes; pero no puedo decir que esto uno pueda considerarlo como una "entrada" tal como lo indica el menú. Es interesante que los platos principales no tienen ningún tipo de acompañamiento, mas estos pueden incluirse por un costo adicional. La polenta cremosa sin pena ni gloria, y los espárragos aún cuando de buen sabor no brindaron valor agregado al plato de carne ordenado.En general el lugar brinda un espacio para una velada agradable con amigos o bien la pareja, con comida de muy buena calidad pero no se encontrará nada que vuele la cabeza o el paladar. Debe tenerse paciencia ya que se hace evidente que si el lugar está lleno, no hay capacidad de atención, por que el servicio decae claramente. En mi caso es un "one hit wonder", por lo que la primera visita posiblemente fue la última.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es un super lugar....las carnes son geniales, el servicio estupendo, y la siempre cordial atención del maitre Sergio hacen que cada comida en Furca sea una super experiencia

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es un restaurante muy fino de excelentes cortes de carne. Nos reunimos todos los miercoles para tener una buena comida y escuchar la palabra de Dios. Costo unicemente 6Mil colones.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Restaurante aceptable; menú OK... la decoración y ambiente excelente. Creo que si se desea impresionar a alguien en especial, es una opción interesante. Ahora bien "good value?" no realmente. Existen lugares como Doris Metropolitan; Martin Fierro, Jurgen's, Lorenzo’s y algunos otros sitios que ofrecen ambientes acogedores y buen balance precio-calidad.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Uno de los mejores restaurantes que hemos visitado. Si deseas ver una crítica completa con fotografías, visita mi perfil para más información

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es un restaurante que tiene un "todo", es decir, el lugar es muy agradable, el servicio muy bueno, igualmente la comida. Da gusto recibir un recipiente con excelentes panes recién horneados y una variedad de mantequilla, con hierbas, con pimientos y un Tapenade. El plato del antipasto vegetariano es de primera y así sucesivamente.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fuimos a una cena después de una reunión de trabajo, con un grupo de aprox 15 persona. El servicio excelente, excelente variedad de vinos y cervezas, buenas las entradas, pero sobretodo la carne espectacular. Yo pedí la picanha de 400g y estaba excelente, jugosa, suave y deliciosa. Adicional, el lugar es muy bonito y moderno. Lo recomiendo.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Mi experiencia en FURCA ha sido fantástica. He tenido la oportunidad de ir 3 veces y las 3 veces me ha encantado. En las 3 veces he pedido foie gras como complemento para mi carne y esto lo resalto dado que en San José es algo muy difícil que encontrar (en otros lados, v.g., el Grano de Oro te lo ofrecen pero resulta en un engaño al consumidor). Debo felicitar al señor gerente por su amabilidad mostrada y por otro parte recomiendo la picanha y los camarones de entrada. Una verdadera delicia. Sugiero tener los menus en inglés también. Dado que es algo cansado tener que traducir todo cuando los acompañantes no hablan español.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: De los mejores restaurantes que hay. He ido dos veces. Una vez fue espectatular, la otra no tanto, mas que todo por el servicio.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Furca es un Restaurante con un ambiente acojedor y de excelente gusto, el personal siempre atento y dispuesto a ofrecer el mejor servicio, ni que hablar de la comida, sabores deliciosos con excelente presentación, definitivamente un lugar con clase que lo hará vivir la mejor experiencia gastronómica!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es uno de mis restaurantes favoritos, la atención impecable, buena carta de vinos, excelente menú y variedad exótica.Caro pero vale la pena

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy buena presentación y excelente comida Muy  buena relación precio calidad!Buen parqueo seguroLa terraza excelente para un extenso almuerzo de negocios o placer con los amigos

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente lugar para un buenísima carne y un ambiente de primera!Servicio muy profesional y cálido. Altamente recomendado!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: La calidad de la comida nunca deja de ser excelente!El ambiente y la arquitectura de primera, es una excelente excelente experiencia gastronómica!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El Restaurante ofrece un ambiente acogedor, con una arquitectura extraordinaria, el pan es sencillamente delicioso, en resumen la experiencia gastronómica es inigualable. Se los recomiendo!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Exelente la comida y el servicio. La atencion de los dueños personalizada. Hoy tuvimos carne y ensalada deliciosa. Limpieza muy buena. Buenos amigos.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente carne  y ensalada , el servicio y la presentación del lugar es impecable. Picaña y ensalada de la casa con queso feta con moras

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Comida y servicio de primera! Las mejores carnes de Costa Rica. Altamente recomendado por ambiente, calidad y servicio.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Ha pasado mucho tiempo que no comía en un restaurante en San José y la verdad que aceptando la recomendación de un amigo llegamos a Furca. En todo momento la calidez y atención del personal fue excelente, las recomendaciones de cada plato estuvieron súper y nos deleitamos con toda la comida, llámese desde las ensaladas hasta las carnes.Furca a nivel internacional, muchas gracias

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El ambiente / decoración del restaurante es muy agradable, luces, cuadros, etc. están perfectamente integrados de una manera armoniosa. Cualquiera de sus tres áreas o ambientes es perfecto. La calidad del servicio es excelente. Desde el momento de tomar la reservación, hasta la atención en el propio restaurante es muy buena. Siempre hay alguien pendiente de todo. Vale la pena resaltar que los meseros manejan a la perfección en qué consiste cada salsa, acompañamiento, y platillos de la carta. Y con relación a lo más importante: La comida! Es muy buena. Tienen una gran variedad de platos para todos los gustos incluso comidas no tradicionales del mercado Costarricense. La carne en su punto con un sabor inigualable. La verdad está muy bien todo, lo único son los precios, que me parecen demasiado elevados dado que en los platos todas las guarniciones y salsas deben pagarse por separado...

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Este lugar es muy bonito. Le dieron mucha importancia a la decoración y a la apariencia... más que a la comida. La comida sí es buena, pero no tanto como la apariencia del lugar. La atención es apenas aceptable. Pero los precios desproporcionadamente elevados. Mejoren el trato y bajen un poco los precios.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Estuvimos anoche 2 parejas de amigos disfrutando del exquisito servicio y de la calidad de la comida, ya sean platos de carne como del pescado, las entradas igualmente deliciosas. No se pierdan el carpacio de salmón, de los mejores que he degustado, ni el steak tartare, una delicia.. ya estamos deseando volver en una proxima ocasión

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El lugar es muy bonito , restaurante muy moderna la infraestructura , excelentes detalles , el ambiente es agradable, con muy buen servicio.La comida es muy bien elaborada , excelentes carnes con maravillosos acompañamientos .El único pequeño punto negativo , es que el costo es un poco más ali de el promedio de este tipo de restaurantes de carnes de primer nivel .Aún así lo recomiendo muy bien , si quiere comer muy bien y pagar un poquito más .

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: El servicio en el restaurante Furca es excelente la atención del personal de servicio como su conocimiento, en la confección de los platos no solo como están decorados sino como se hace el producto que usaron de donde viene y lo exclusivo que puede ser, además el gusto de cada plato demuestra la pasión de la cocina en proceso.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Recomiendo a los buenos comedores de finos cortes no perderse esta experiencia, la disfruto con mi familia al menos 1 vez por semana.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: No creo que volveremos ir aquí. Da lástima cuando en un restaurante la comida esta rica pero la atención de los meseros y los gerentes es PESIMA. Como es que un restaurante con tres mesas llenas no tenga suficiente menús para dar? O será que la hostess se da el taco de decir que no hay más menús cuando tienen el estante llenos de menús--porque desde adonde nosotros estábamos sentados se veían que sí tenía menús pero no nos quería dar más que 2. Nuestro mesero ni nos volvió a ver una vez que nos sirvió la comida. Y después de haber pagado, le comentamos a uno de los gerentes que el servicio estuvo fatal y la respuesta de el fue como sí no le hubiera importado. Ósea, pobre el Chef! El se esfuerza en dar una comida rica, y los otros se esfuerzan en dar pésimos servicio, cuando algunas veces el servicio habla más que la comida.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Este es un restaurante ubicado cerca del Estadio Nacional, en Rohmoser. El lugar es muy lindo, cuidadosamente bien decorado, dando un ambiente cálido y acogedor. El menú es variado con una especialización en carnes. La comida es muy buena y muy bien presentada. Y un excelente servicio! Se los recomiendo y les garantizo pasaran un momento bien placentero :-)

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Pedimos salmón y faisán, ambos muy bien preparados. Le pedimos al mesero que le dijera al chef que el faisán debía estar suave (otra persona se había quejado). El chef vino a explicarnos porqué había ocurrido eso antes. Los meseros tienen muy buen conocimiento del menú. la decoración es moderna y agradable. Usan cortes nacionales de buena calidad. El lugar es caro.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fui a Furca con mi esposo hace 1 mes. Compartimos una entrada de remolacha que estaba deliciosa y un pescado, que también estaba rico. La decoración del lugar es muy bonita y la huerta que tienen en el jardín es bella. Todo bien hasta que llegó la cuenta!! Nos pareció que es demasiado caro. Cada porción de carne o pescado viene sin acompañamientos, por lo que si uno quiere agregar algo sale aún más caro. Además la copa de vino de la casa incrementa exageradamente la cuenta (6000 colones cada copa).

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es una excelente opción de una mezcla de un restaurante fino pero casual.  Excelentes cortes y servicio, además del ambiente en general.  Realmente tiene un gusto exquisito con la decoración interna y externa. Recomendado 100%

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: La carne, el servicio y el ambiente como deben ser!La relación precio/calidad es sólida.Vale la pena!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy buena atención, buena y deliciosa comida. Con una decoración muy agradable. Ideal para reunirse con familia y amigos.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Tienen una carne unica,en un frigorifico acristalado dejan madurar los cortes el tiempo preciso,todas las piezas tienen vetas de grasa en el interior,son "marmoleadas",lo que les da un sabor unico.Es carne nacional, no hace falta importar carne de USA,gracias señores de Furca.El resto esta bien, pero aun puede mejorar

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Es un restaurante con un excelente ambiente, comida excelente, variedad de menú internacional, buen servicio, carta de vinos ampliaEs un lugar muy conveniente, buena ubicación y con un menú exquisitoDesde su apertura han mejorado la atención y rapidez en el servicio sin desmejorar la calidad de la comida

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Went with a group of people for business. They all had steaks which had mixed reviews amongst them. What I loved was the service and dessert, the carpaccio got me ill so I would stay away from it. The creme brûlée was one of the best I have ever had.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We were fortunate enough to get the Chefs table at this amazing restaurant. From the moment we entered we knew we were going to have an amazing meal. The staff were attentive, friendly and professional from the get go. It was an absolute blast to sit where we did and to have the Chef select courses and wines along with the maitre d'. The food , service, atmosphere were all way above what I expected. I have been in the restaurant and wine business for too many years to count but FURCA way exceeded even my standards. Thanks Chef for the amazing food!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The place is nice, the service was excellent. They have their own urban farm on the restaurant. I had a Chateaubriand with mushrooms that was just good on my opinion. The place is expensive but I might give it a second try with a different dish.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I had heard about Furca before. I went there with my mother, sadly they had just run out of t-bone steaks so I ordered a ribeye steak, it was pretty good. I ordered it medium rare, perfectly done. I also ordered the gnocchi with chorizo and leeks, the gnocchi's texture was perfect, tender, slightly grilled, delicious.My mother had the tenderloin, I tried some of it, exquisite. Service was impecable, specially by the hostess.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The Place is gorgeous , all the personnel was very, very attentive, clean, beautifully decorated. Loved the outside fire pit, which you could see through the glass window, gave a cousy and romantic feel to the place.Both me and my girlfriend asked for the boneless ribeye, When I think of Costa Rica I think of Beef , so I wanted a Stake up to Mortons or Ruth Chris level, The meals was really good but I though it was not great, the beef was cooked to the perfect degree, and the hot plates kept it warm, but did not continue to cook it as I have experienced in other places. The wine selection chart was very limited, I enjoy a good Rioja or Cabernet Savingion with my Beef, and could not find the wine I wanted. Also the wine is very expensive, for not the top of the line vintages. all in all a very nice And romantic place

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This place was amazing. Me and my wife really enjoyed the food, the service and how clean and beautiful the restaurant was. Traveled all the way from Atlanta Ga and this place was the best.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Don't let the mix of late 90's charm and modern mix of decor fool you - this place is top notch steakhouse!Hard to beat a place in San Jose with on-premise aged steaks and a wine list to satisfy most wine lovers in Central America.I highly recommend trying this restaurant while you are in San Jose, it's a great experience and the staff is wonderfully friendly and helpful. I will be back.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We were talking about how great the food and wine is in Costa Rica. My go-to has always been Esquina de Buenos Ares (also, a fantastic place I've reviewed). But, my friend mentioned Furca -- and they were right! I have a new favorite in San Jose!Amazing food, service, style. The great things:- Excellent food, perfectly prepared, lots of 'panache' to the presentation.- Spacious seating (some places are a bit cramped, not this one).Bad things? Nothing. You'll love it.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The food is excellent and the presentation of dishes is amazing. They have their own herbs that they harvest from the backyard that you can see from the parking place. It is expensive, but it worth the visit.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We were teated to a great culinary experience. The staff were friendly and helpful. Will definitely return.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Went there with a friend who wanted to try the place, so I didn't have any kind of idea or expectation of what it would be like. It was a pleasant surprise when we walked in. Furca is really nicely decorated, the seats are comfortable and the place is spacious.The meals were great. I'd recommend the picanha. which was delicious. My friend had the t-bone which turned out to be too much meat for her, but it was delicious as well.The service was pretty good, but it does get a bit annoying when the waiters keep feeling your glass with wine; I usually prefer to do it myself.Overall great dining experience. Very much recommended for meat and wine lovers.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: at first look, the prices seem high but the food is so good (the cut "entrecotte", the best meat I have tried so far in Costa Rica) Forget about la Esquina de Buenos Aires, this place beats any others with this quality of meat. I will definitely come back here to try out the other dishes. highly recommended.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: So this place is a bit unique with the way they cook your meat cuts. First they mature the meat in a special cellar filled with salt, now Im not a meat processing conoisseur, but this makes the meat amazing. The appetizers, drinks, desserts were incredible. They even have their own garden outside for fresh spices. Its a little pricier than your average place, but the quality of food, service and local far out weigh the difference. A 3 course meal may run you about $85 a person. If you get the order desert, be sure to try the flower on your plate, it´s a peculiar taste.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The whole experience was amazing. The staff, atmosphere, green house, food... everything. If you're in San Jose visit this place!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Furca is without doubt one of the best restaurants in San Jose. It's not on an international gourmet level, but it's a super modern international restaurant with good quality food, service and wine. When you dine in Furca you could be many places in the world, but you can relax knowing that you are well taken care of. Furca is the place to go after a busy day where you want to spoil yourself a bit or for a special evening out.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I came to visit my sister who has lived in Costa Rica all of her life. I was born in CR, but, left with mom when I was 10. Yes, safe to say I am a Gringo that loves both my home country and my USA opportunity. Having been hosted at her house in a warm and special way, I told her - Annie, choose ANY restaurant in San Jose. I want to take you and Fede there. Both are foodies and know San Jose restaurants quite well. She chose Furca.Furca is not what I would call fancy or stuffy. It is relaxed and comfortable. Most people come in smart casual dress as Ticos usually do, especially the younger ones. Meaning 30s and 40s. I felt comfortable right away. Waiter Randall was excellent and seeing our dilemma with extensive menu, softly suggested serving two of their famous meats on a hot plate with sides. That way we could sample both. Since I drift to medium rare and Annie and Fede like rare, he said, "No problem. I will bring an additional hotter metal plate and you can cook at the table to your desired doneness. Worked great. We all got exactly what we wanted. Three sauces inclusive of a great bearnaise. Lastly, after a great meal and with great wine, we opted for an assorted cheese plate to share. Great cheeses from their cheese locker. There were about 8 kinds served with hard, thin hard bread.Having had such a great experience, I asked to meet Marco the owner/chef. He was a young guy who was always in the kitchen or visiting guests. The kitchen is visible from the dining room. He appreciated my favorable comments.Such a great experience, I called Annie and asked her and Fede to lunch next week so we can try the lunch offerings. I want to try their hamburger. Having had Tico food a bit much during this stay, I want USA food. I want to be reminded of the great country that has given me a fantastic life. Forever grateful, USA.Don't miss Furca when you are in San Jose. Really. Dinner fine dining, lunch can be mid range based on what I saw on the menu.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I trust the reviewers on TripAdvisor and try to bring honesty and enthusiasm for discovering special spots while traveling. Please believe me, just skip this. Service was very attentive, drinks were great, wine list is gorgeous, setting is fun. The food is simply bland. Beautifully prepared, bland and average food. Not even that delicious seared and charred flavor to the meat. Not worth it.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelent and nice , we were group of people and ordered various type of meat . It was fresh tasty and delicious

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Incredible place for any occasion.  The food and ambiance are incredible.  Appetisers and desserts are to die for!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Came with foodie cousins, and they were blown away. Simply superb. Salmon Capaccio, Tempura Shrimp as big as robins. Pasta mariscos, Steaks, Sea Bass, Almond Prawline w/ expresso

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: My husband, son and I had lunch at Furca to celebrate my son's birthday. We are dedicated foodies and I am a chef, so we seldom eat out as we are hard to please and very difficult to wow. We were wowed! The food is exceptional and exciting. Each and every item was perfectly prepared, seasoned and presented. I highly recommend this beautiful restaurant.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I need the experience.Outstanding ambient, menu and food. The service is poor though, like most of the places in Costa Rica. These guys need to spend a month in São Paulo - Brazil to learn how does a customer should be treated (specially when you charge high prices). I feel sorry for the customers who are force to accept such a lousy service.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This is a five star restaurant by all international standards. Great food and wine selection.The food is generally international with good steaks and fish but with also a nice central American touch. Amongst the table we ordered several cuts of steak, octopus, salmon, ribs, rabbit and nice Argentinian wine.It was all well-cooked, beautifully presented and high class.Definitely a great place for a business dinner, a special occasion or just a treat.Not a cheap eat but not out of the range for the quality. prices I think are 20% lower than a corresponding restaurant in the United States (think Ruth Chris or other good steak-houses)Would definitely recommend a visit

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Nothing to get excited about.  Average cuisine, tacky decor, substandard service.   This may be acceptable for Costa Rica however this is not world class dining by any means.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We had a group business lunch in their outside dining area. The grilled octopus starter was beautifully done -- soft and flavorful on the inside and crispy and charred on the outside - served with a dressing, red onions and avocado. They have many farm-to-table cuts of meat available for main course and I went for the smaller picanha cut washed down with a glass of malbec. It was delicious as was the very unusual but refreshing cardamom ice cream for dessert!Staff were really accommodating and helpful and patient with me - the only non-Spanish speaker at the table.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Good parking in the rear parking lot. Easy access to the restaurant. Very good, warm atmosphere. Excellent live music. Quality food, dining selections and service.  Prices are midrange to upper range, depending on your selection. One of the best restaurants in Central America.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We always head straight or the bar where we know we will get great cocktails and wine. We love the small plates - never had one dish that wasn't good. Normally we have them with G&Ts and a bottle of red wine, but two of us had Caipirinhas this time - they are keepers. Prices are, in my opinion, good value, and given the quality of their offerings, well worth every colon.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The food is amazing to be honest. However, the menu does not have gluten free options visible and they don't ask when serving the initial bread.The waiters were all very kind, we asked them twice to change the temperature from the A/C and they were very nice about it.Again, the food was awesome and the waiters were very knowledgeable about the food and their ingredients.Bad thing? The woman that "welcomes" you when you arrive. She was BEYOND rude, not even a "Good evening" ... she didn't even ask what was up when we entered the door. After we ate they gave us a piece of paper to write our suggestions or things to be improved and of course we complained about this, no kindness whatsoever when you enter the place... so they apologized and said thanks....so we're leaving now and the same woman opens up the door for us to leave, we say a warm "thank you, good night" and what does she do? turns her freaking head and closes the door in our faces! So much for manners for a restaurant that is trying to be a high-end experience.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This place serves great meat and wine selection. Portions are relatively small. Main dish includes only the meat, sides are all charged extra. Wine was great, but hugely overpriced...highly recommended, but comes with hefty bill!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Having been invited to this restaurant I hesitated if I should write this NEGATIVE review as it might be considered an insult on our host’s taste. But after having learned of their stomach ache the days after I feel I should go ahead.My wife is sensitive to certain ingredients so she asked the waiter to explain the food a bit more in detail, she then asked for certain elements to be left out. The waiter protested saying that the plate on the menu with all its ingredients was a balanced meal. Be that as it may, my wife insisted that ingredients were left out. Waiter was clearly not happy. She ordered her meat well done, it came medium so she send it back to the kitchen; the waiter again showed his unhappiness.Then my plate; I ordered Lomito Furca, basically the best meat you can have. Medium rare. I arrived on a COLD plate thus the meat was way below acceptable temperature, I complained to the waiter who took it back the kitchen. When he reappeared some time later, the (fresh) plate was again cold and the original meat was simply REHEATED (!) and therefore BONE-DRY, and still cold. Furthermore, to give the meat a bit of a taste, it had been showered with coarse salt, nearly breaking teeth. All in all not a pleasant experience.When leaving we were completely IGNORDED expect for the young lady at the reception.And the stomach ache three of us suffered to next couple of days? There is a suspicion of an overdose of meat tenderizer… or could it have been the meat was previously frozen meat?Is all bad than? No, the wine list is very good indeed and the restaurant has a pleasant atmosphere. But that doesn’t make up for bad food and shoddy service.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Yesterday we celebrated a friend's birthday at Furca; it was perfect. Their attention to details like the washcloth before the meal, the courteous and quick bilingual service, and the food itself, was outstanding. All of this in an elegant atmosphere, with live music in the background. I strongly recommend having an appetizer, (small), and any of their meat cuts, cooked to perfection. A bit on the pricey side, but worth every penny!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I went to this restaurant as part of a large group dinner after business meeting. Excellent dishes, wine selection, dessert. Service was very good, polite and prompt.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Excellent quality steak at Furca, along with a variety of strong appetizers. Went here for a business lunch, and it was a great surprise.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: What a nice surprise to come to this steakhouse! Great variety on the menu! It is a must if you are in San Jose!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: My kids and I found this gem hidden inside a neighborhood not far from metropolitan park in San Jose. We went on a Sunday afternoon and, upon arriving, noticed that they had a nice jazz duo playing live. Unfortunately, they packed things up not too long after we arrived (three-ish) but, it really set a nice ambiance for a Sunday lunch. There is a bit of a language barrier but, knowing a little Spanish, we were able to order with no problem (at least the menu was translated into English, lol). The food was great! Definitely enjoyed my freshly made pasta and my son's prime rib sandwich was amazing! The smoked salmon salad didn't impress my youngest daughter but, my eldest definitely enjoyed her jumbo shrimp. My only complaint would be the portion sizes of some of the courses. My pasta and the sandwich was perfect but, the shrimp and salad definitely could have been a bit more robust for the price. Overall, we enjoyed the experience and would definitely recommend this lovely spot!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I went a couple of times to enjoy better the restaurant, it was very good. Wine with good alternatives, great environment, great service and of course very good food.The picanha was great, one special with a great steak and big shrimps (spicy) was excellent combination. Of course with some optopus to start the night.If you don't want to make mistakes, just be sure to get a great service in a wonderful steakhouse. This is the place.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant is famous for its good meat and it is really very good. As i was living in Greece many years,i ordered also a greek salad and it was perfect, the fetta was excellent. We had some red chilian wine and the evening was perfect.Thank u.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We went to Furca for lunch, it’s near where my Brother used to live and he wanted to take us. This is a fancy restaurant, we turned up in shorts and t shirts which isn’t what everyone else was wearing – this is more of a dress up place.The restaurant didn’t bat an eyelid at our attire but by the cars in the car park and the way the majority of patrons were dressed I’m sure we were the exception.The restaurant is nicely done out and the service is great, they have their meat fridge visible with glass you can see the meat hanging there when you go into the lobby near the toilets. Everything is nice the toilets are beautiful.The food was fabulous though we had fillet mignon and it was awesome, we really, really like our steak and cook ourselves a lot so very often a fillet out is a disappointment, here it wasn’t quite the opposite, it was a delight.Great food, lovely surroundings – just wish I’d dressed up!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: If you know what a Steakhouse is and should be, this is the place. The scene is sexy and the attention to detail is perfect.Went with my girlfriend for a nice dinner and this is exactly what it was. We ordered a few appetizers and they where well executed and very well presented.We had a wonderful bottle of wine and a very relaxed evening. Was very romantic for us but also we saw some tables that where clearly business meetings! Definately going to have my next business meeting there , especially if i want to impress!I recommend 100% for what ever occasion!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: You step behind that giant front door and you are immediately somewhere else, first class, in the world. The design and decor of the place is top notch A class, super comfortable, modern, gorgeous. Definitely without a doubt the best restaurnt space in CR. Beats everybody (including all my favorites like Doris, Bacchus, Aqui Es...).While it doesn't beat Doris on steaks, at the food level it is a GREAT alternative with plenty of other options as well and without the hassle of the drive over the hills to Santa Ana. Very good wine list and excellent choices par copa in a proper enomatic machine.The Raclette starter is a thing of vegetarian beauty: new potatoes and aspargus and peppers covered in cheese and delivered on a hot plate. The steaks are delicious; found the lunch special steak to be a tad thin but was much cheaper and still tasty.Friends have has pasta here and raved about it.You want a cheaper steak? Hit Aqui Es! You want a nicer steak? Hit Doris. You want a better that impresses and delights a broader group of eaters in a thoroughly modern, up to date and, yeah, beautiful restarant space, come here. Ain't cheap. Shouldn't be.This is first class.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I was staying at a hotel close to the San Jose stadium and wanted to go to a 5 star restaurant. Furca was recommended to my by my hotel.I went for an early dinner, around 6 PM. The restaurant was 25% full and the customers were well monied Costa Ricans over age 65. I ordered a salad and grilled rib-eye steak. It is extremely difficult to get a quality steak in Costa Rica so I was looking forward to this entree. The salad was wonderful, and a little larger than expected. The rib-eye steak was served sizzling on a cast iron platter - it was wonderful!My meal was approximately $ 70.00 USD.... Salad, steak, 2 glasses of wine plus taxes and gratuities.I will definitely go back !

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This was above excellent, service was top notch even when a colleague knocked his wine over they appeared from nowhere to clear the mess up, no fuss no hassle. Great Wine, Great Menu lots to chose from. The quality of the food is top notch. Great place to go for any occasion from couples to friends and families, just a shame I found it the night before I leave San Jose. Upon my return I will be booking a return trip

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Seriously one of the best meals I've had in Central America. Primarily a steakhouse but they have other options. Pricey, very. I had a martini, glass of good red wine, foie gras, small steak and my bill was $100+. Sat at the bar.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Place and environment are amazing! Very romantic and luxury! But unfortunately this is the end! They a very good list of wines but with prices that inflation considered was 1.000%! And main courses are well offered to be build up with sides, but final price will cost you thousands (USD)!!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I love this restaurant. The place mixes a great space with bits of art here and there with a delicious menu. Desserts are the best, make sure you try them! But overall, the meat and risottos and the wine selection are excellent, along with the great service of all the staff.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Very good attention , the salmon burger i recommend and the shrimp tempanyaki.it is a restaurant specialized for meat.But for vegetarian the salmon burger and shrimp very good.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I normally stay in the Escazu area but will come more often to Furfa. Amazing food great service. Great meats and side dishes are also tasteful. Meats are amazing and the portibello with cheese makes a perfect side.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I visited this restaurant with a group of co-workers. The food was amazing and the service was great. The hostess gave us a mini tour in the restaurant explaining the different concepts around the reataurant and the vegetables they grow right there. The Chateaubriand was fantastic and the sea scallops were perfect. Great place to visit in CR!!!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I had the salmon with mashed sweet potatoes and it was delicious!! We all had a margarita and it was strong and good too! Great ambiance/atmosphere! It's a little pricey but worth it!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Had been in this restaurant twice last year. Went there yesterday. The service is excellent and the food amazing, particularly if the client likes meat. The chef grills it to perfection. A very good wine list. They serve also excellent starters (octupus) and the desserts particularly good.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: My wife and I had an evening in San Jose and this Restaurant was suggested by our hotel, and we could not have been happier with the service and food provided. It was a little expensive, but the quality of all the dishes from the appetizers to the deserts were amazing, and very flavorful

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Although rather on the expensive side, this restaurant offers a variety of delicious dishes in a cozy atmosphere. The herbs found in the beautifully presented dishes are home grown, the meat cured in their installations. The charming Chef and owner goes from table to table to make sure your culinary experience meets all your expectations. I highly recommend the grilled octopus, one of the most well-balanced dishes I have ever tried.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Very nice restaurant, service ok. The meat: regular meat, it is not tasty, probably a frozen fillet. Good wine, affordable price. Accessible location. A good steak should be tasty, one whole piece of steak and not pre-cut. I did not have good luck this time?

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We are delighted to have found this gem of an upscale restaurant. I relish the Corbina dinner, and the deserts were heavenly. Simply Superb!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I've been fortunate enough to eat at many great places around the world and Furca is one of my all-time favorites.Its located a few blocks from my home, so I've visited several times and have always had a glorious experience.If you are in San Jose and have $150 to spend on a fabulous dinner for 2, Furca is well worth it.Its a great place for couples, a fancy celebrations with family and friends, or a business meal meant to impress.Recommendations:- Breads and spreads- Octopus appetizer- Salmon Carpaccio- All of the steaks

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Incredible food ... And a marvelous service a great experience you should have every time you can ... I recommend this place ...Try the scallops ... The hamburger ... The salmon carpaccio

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: From the wine to appetizer to main course and dessert, it was all amazing. The taste, presentation, service and atmosphere was all top noche!! Do miss going here when going to San Jose. Fantastic!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Nice restaurant with very good meat selection. The pulpo was also very nice. Nice decoration and terrace.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: From the valet parking to the warm goodbye and thank you, Furca is a perfect example of how a restaurant should be operated. The service is fantastic and the food is excellent. This place is a top 10 in San Jose. And the violinist is magnificent.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Three of us went after being recommended by a friend. We were not disappointed. The wine list is very good with lots of choice and range. The menu has plenty of selection and one of had the duck and small portion of lamb, both done perfectly. Another dish ordered was the salmon which also was excellent. The last main was a vegetarian pasta and that too was really well received. Service was excellent and we were not rushed. The atmosphere is very nice with tables having good room between them so you are not cramped at all. A must stop if you are in the area.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Fur a was a 5 minute walk up the street from my hotel (Hilton Garden Inn) and I went by for an early dinner based on the very good reviews. Was not disappointed. The decor is contemporary but very warm and classy. Service from the moment I walked in the door was professional, quick and appropriately attentive. I had the veal tongue which was rich and tasty with a wonderful sauce and served with mushrooms. The lamb chops I followed with were perfectly cooked and excellent with the accompanying asparagus. I ended with a tiramisu - not traditional but very well presented and a nice size for the end of a filling meal. I had a couple of glasses of the house Malbec - decent - and finished with a Cognac. Overall a relaxing and very enjoyable dinner.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This would put many famous restaurants to shame, the atmosphere, decor and service are truly 5 star. Every stage of our dinner was absolutely fantastic and served perfectly, from appetizer to dessert. This was our most expensive $$$$ meal as well and soooo worth it :) Highly recommend!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Truly fantastic.  I have been here numerous times and have always had highest quality service and food.  Their prices are a bit high though but worth it for a nice occasion

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Best steak and lamb. Great service and excellent food. Highly recomend and will return. Wine selection was great. Topped it off with some creme boleaux

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We had the rabbit and the picanha steak. Both were well prepared and the breads that preceded it were also good. The rabbit was very tender and moist. We also had the chocolate dessert, also well prepared and delicious. Good service and ambiance.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I selected this restaurant based on TA's positive reviews and its proximity to our hotel, the Hilton Garden Inn. It is a three minute walk from the hotel, but does involve crossing a highway where the speed limits don't seem to matter.We arrived a few minutes early of our 18:30 reservation and were led to a nice two top away from the center of this beautiful facility. The open kitchen is in full view and even has a "chef's table" comprising of 4 stools overlooking the action.We started with a bread course (extra cost) that consisted of several varieties of breads and a selection of toppings. There was nothing left after five minutes...delicious.The wife chose the veal tongue with mushroom appetiser and I had a tempura shrimp for my choice. The tongue was enough to serve two as a first course. She shared after I devoured my shrimp.We both chose steak dishes for our main courses. We tend to be more familiar with grain fed beef in the United States which has a higher marbling factor than the grass fed we were served. The flavour was good, but the meat tended to be a little tougher than our normal experience. We had an extra cost side of bearnaise sauce that was very good. The spinach and potato dishes we ordered complimented the main course very well.For dessert we ordered the chocolate beignet concoction that included ice cream, fruit, chocolate filled beignet and a chocolate dipping sauce. I am glad we only ordered one.Service was handled by an experienced team with very good English skills. My Spanish skills do not exist.The total bill came to $137.00 USD that included a glass of wine for the wife and a beer for me. This is a great value compared to what we would have paid in the US for a similar meal.A couple of small things need to be corrected. The printout of the bill was unreadable. They need to change the ribbon in their printer. Their web site is a Facebook page. For a place this great they need to upgrade their Internet presence.Book this place when you are in San Jose. It is a must fine dining experience.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I was introduced to this restaurant by a friend who lives in Costa Rica. They make their own bread and have their own garden.  Everything from the steak, vegetables and salad was amazing! A must visit!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This is the absolute BEST restaurant in town. I live one block away and go there for all the special occasions. Birthdays, anniversaries, business, etc. the dinning room is warm and sophisticated, service good (for costaricans who barely know anything about customer service) and the food is extraordinary... It is expensive but completely worth it. I highly recommend it.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Everything was excellent:1. The selection of warm breads2. The octupus, not in the menu but really oustanding3. The t - bone lamb was to die for4. Great lemonade5. Outstanding service6. No reservation needed on a Saturday around 3 pmI will come back for more

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I have had salmon which was absolutely great. Since I do not eat meat It was difficult to make more comments. I could feel that their steaks are very tasty as well. One negative thing: the side dishes were too greasy. Will be back to try more.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We walked in from the street as we saw this on trip advisor and stayed at Hilton nearby. The place was full so we started in the bar with a glass of whine and an appetizer. It was superb and the bartender was the waiter. A table opened up and we sat down for main course and desert. All the food and service meet the quality of the price tagg. I would say even exceeds it. The bartender followed us as waiter and we had an enjoy full evening with 1st class service and excellent food, served with precision and timing. This place is not expensive. To have a couple of wines, 2 appetizers 2 main course and one romantic shared desert at the price of 130 dollars with that quality and service is a I will return soon guarantee. Extra points for the synergy between the staff and live music played at a comfortable volume with the right tunes for to match the surroundings. I won't say more because I don't won't to create too high expectations and ruin you stay. Bring your important people here. Thank you!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This is the other great steakhouse in the western half of San José. It is nicer than the other one and has a greater diversity in its menu, but its meat is slightly less tasty. As the other one, it is also very pricey.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I have been wanting to go since it opened. I had heard nothing but good things. My experience for a recent lunch visit lived up to its reputation. Food was excellent. We ordered a bunch of small plates to share. Food was exquisite. Service was very good as well and very accommodating.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: In the handful of times that I have traveled to San Jose, this has to be close to the top meal that I have experienced. The steak was cooked perfectly, with each bite melting in my mouth. Keep in mind that this is a bit pricey, and not really a place for families, but for a romantic or business meal, you cant beat it!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Furca is a great restaurant set in a beautifully renovated house in Rohrmoser,San Jose. Starting with delicious warm bread served with a variety of butters followed by a well rounded menu that offers their specialty meats as well as nice salads, pastas and fish.Of special interest for me is the easy access for handicaps since I enjoy taking my grandmother for lunch. I love their beef carpaccio served with quail eggs and pickled mustard. Their gnoccis are my grandmas favorite dish served with option of 3 different sauces. Meat is great as well as all their side dishes.Desserts are better than what you find at most restaurants in CR.I truly recommend Furca. Find more about my favorite places in Costa Rica on Costa Rica by Nataly.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We went to Furca on a whim during our last night in Costa Rica. I was nervous about wearing flip flops (that's all I had on vaca) but I looked around and some men were wearing sneakers and jeans so I didn't feel so bad! We ordered scallops and coconut shrimp for appetizers. We were given a choice between small shrimps and colossal shrimps - obviously we went for the bigger ones. Both apps were delicious. I later regretted the giant shrimp, even though they were delicious - it was just too much food. For dinner I got the sirloin and my husband got the New York (strip I'm assuming). For sides I got veggies and gorgonzola mash, he got the mashed sweet potatoes. Everything was excellent. I didn't love the gorgonzola mash as much as others I have had, but in total it was an excellent meal. The bartender came to the table to take our drink order which was different. The ambiance is rustic and romantic. It was a great night!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We ask for a reservation the day before and the table was waiting for 6 of us, the waiter welcome as in a very gentle manner. Superb quality meat.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: After a reservation mishap at Park Café, we were recommended to have dinner at Furca instead. It is a beautiful restaurant with a sleek, expansive interior and a secure gated parking lot adjacent to it. Service is professional from the hostess at the podium to the waiter during dinner service. Although it is a steakhouse, we had just had steak for lunch so we decided to order other items. We started with the carpaccio and the beef tongue, both of which were very good. With more components than usual, the carpaccio was served with a mound of local leafy greens, shallots and quail eggs while the tender beef tongue was served under a pile of fragrant fried leeks. For main courses, we both ordered the gnocchi with mushrooms, which was fine but not great. The gnocchi was quite dense and the whole dish was on the heavy side. The serving size is quite large so order accordingly. We would have been more than full with appetizers and a shared main course.Prices are certainly elevated by Costa Rican standards but you are paying a large part for the sophisticated setting, polished service and refined cooking. Overall, I would recommend it for nice evening out but perhaps not for a casual meal.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Have been to Furca on many occasion. The place continues to impress me. It is the best place to eat meat in San Jose. It is not the run of the mill stake house, it is a complete fine dine experience. Recommended for family or for business dinners.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Before going I had read mixed reviews about the place, but after going I can safely and surely say that it's my favorite Restaurante in Costa Rica, delicious high quality food and food service.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I don't give Perfect ratings... Until now. Our first time here. Clean, modern outside with ample parking and security. Although we did not have reservations, we were seated promptly and with numerous smiles and welcomes. Awesome live violinist for ambiance. Impeccable service. And the best food I have eaten in a long time. I'm can't say enough good things about this experience. And the prices were very reasonable. Coming back for brunch on Sunday.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: This place is outstanding. The service, the food. The meat is my favorite. Is one of the best restaurants i am eaten in Costa Rica. Is definitely a must.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: I personally eat there over 20 times and with that experience on had I, as a Chef, realice that my college Marco Leiva succeed on one of the most difficult tasks of having a restaurant: Consistency!!The level of service, ambience and of course the food are enough to please those clients that seek quality, good taste and amazing ingredients!Big congrats for the whole team, I can wait to be in town again!!Cheers!!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: We were in San Jose to catch a flight back to the U.S. after 7 awesome days in Costa Rica. After driving around town looking for a dinner spot, we ran across Furca by chance. We immediately pulled in after we saw they had a security guard policing the parking lot; our car was loaded down with our luggage and security was key.We were quickly sat and was even given a tour of the restaurant, introduced to the chef owner, and were explained the menu.We had quite a few hours before our flight left, so our server was very accommodating that we wanted to take our time and enjoy the ambiance and food.Appetizers: the sea scallops and Rosemary bread were to die for. Small portions, but just right before you indulge in your main course.We enjoyed the ribeye for our main course accompanied with stuffed portobello mushroom & sautéed vegetables. The steak arrived to the table on a sizzling cast iron plate -- presentation was amazing! Food was even better.You must try the chocolate praline dessert... Definitely worth saving room for.The staff were all courteous and friendly. We would definitely come back to Furta if in the San Jose area again soon.

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: The location, decoration, are perfect!The service are very good, but sometimes waitress should be more natural and relax!Chef Leiva is outstanding!There are many options in the menu, but usually you go there for meat!Very good choice for special occasions!

Direccion: Boulevard de Rohrmoser Diagonal al BCT, San José Costa Rica
Comentario: Last week I had a client based in Dubai visiting Costa Rica, I had an urge to find a great international restaurant where I could impress my client with a great dinner and finalize important business conversations. We were greeted by an average hostess, not to friendly not to interested in the new patrons.The restaurant was not full, we were assigned the least desirable table on the side of a column.The bar is poorly stocked, they do not have non-alcoholic beer, not even one brand...The menu was handed out to us with no further explanation by the waiter. We really appreciate when the waiters take time to explain the restaurant specialties, dishes that we should not miss, or evening specials. But nothing was said.
